website_summaries.verdict: Up to 10 times faster than a hole saw, these hole cutters are fantastic for cutting large holes quick when framing or remodeling.
pros: Intended for use with wood and metal
Comes with 6 hole cutters from 2-1/8 to 4-1/4 inches, 1 arbor with pilot bit, 2 pilot bits, 1 diamond file, and 1 hex wrench
Tooth geometry lets you drill 10 times faster than hole saw
3-tooth design gives you up to 600 holes without resharpening
Deep gullets reduced pilot bit shank make it easier to release the plug
Manufactured for durability in case of unintended nail impacts
cons: Produces coarse cuts intended for framing, not clean, finished cuts
Easy to overcut because of large, quick cutting

customer_reviews.title: This set was exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to go with my new battery-operated Milwaukee HoleHawg and I was very pleased with it. It's well-made, the cutting tools are easy to attach to the pilot drill, and I was amazed at how quickly the tools cut through wood -- really almost like butter! If you are a professional and you need to drill a lot of holes in studs or joists, this toolset will pay for itself the first time you use it, IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: Makes holesaws or auger bits useless in new construction rough in
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Dalberg

customer_reviews.title: Goood
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the trades for 17 yrs and these have got to be the best hole saws for lumber you will find.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice FAST hole saw; they're not perfect but work great for large holes.
customer_reviews.text: Works better than self-feed wood boring bits. These cut big holes fast and without the mess of self-feed bits. The plugs come out easy as the carbide teeth are wider than the sidewall of the bit and they use a spade bit in the center. I accidentally started one with the Dewalt Drill in hammer mode and the hole cut even faster. These are like other hole saws in their ability to, unlike self-feeds, to cut holes on an angle. The largest CON is: These leave a ROUGH hole. Lenox is still my go to hole saw when neat holes are needed, but they take more time as it's harder to get the plugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Man

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These bits are awesome!!! I am a Plumber and needed decent bits on the job. These bits rock! Cut through like melting butter
customer_reviews.author: John E Giroux

customer_reviews.title: I'm Sold
customer_reviews.text: I have used selffeed bits for the past 35 years in the plumbing trade but now that there are more nails and screws to dill with it has been hard to keep them sharp and not damaged well the first day I used these holes saws with a cordless drill I was sold. I hope they will make more sizes Virgil M Plumber
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Milwaukee 10 piece hole saw kit cut so fast it make my job so much easier
customer_reviews.author: George De Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Huge time saver making holes for electrical services and wiring, I have 3 of the kits
customer_reviews.author: scott moses

customer_reviews.title: The world has two categories, things you need and things you could do without.
customer_reviews.text: This is something you need. And you have needed for quite some time. If I added up the boxes of holesaws I have stashed in trucks and on shelves, I bet I would have at least a couple thousand dollars invested. And before these I was investing in landfill material. You won't believe the difference in a quality holesaw. Honestly. Ask yourself this, when was the last time I cut myself on a holesaw because it was so sharp. For me that answer is never. Until these. They are that sharp and they stay that way.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hole saw set for about 18 months. It works great. You won't believe how easily it bores holes in all types of wood. It is really fast.
customer_reviews.author: W. Remodeling

customer_reviews.title: I had to do it in two steps due to the depth but other than that it performed great! I also like the fact that they slightly ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make a hole in a 8" thick sill beam for a 4" dryer vent pipe. It cut the hole faster than anything I've ever used in the past. I had to do it in two steps due to the depth but other than that it performed great! I also like the fact that they slightly oversize the hole sizes. For instance a 4" dryer pipe needs a hole slightly larger than 4". The big hawg kit had a 4 1/4" hole cutter that left just enough slack to easily get the vent pipe through. Finish it off with a little foam to make it air tight and it's done. Good set of cutters.
customer_reviews.author: VTboy

customer_reviews.title: " AWESOME"
customer_reviews.text: the big hawg kit is awesome. 6 saws to get all the common size holes done. works perfect with the milwalkee super hawg drill. i'm a plumber, so now i can rough without being tired at the end of the day. i also got the milwalke switch blade kit.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: These wood hole saws are simply awesome and are hungry to eat through wood a definite ...
customer_reviews.text: These wood hole saws are simply awesome and are hungry to eat through wood a definite great buy but beware they don't leave a smooth bore if that is what you are looking for but are great for HVAC rough ins

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for large hole drilling.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because I thought it would do a better job cutting large holes compared to the Milwaukee Plumber's boring kit I already own. I should have returned it because I rarely use any of the bits - they are simply too coarse. The standard plumbers bits doe a much better job in terms of hole quality and while not as fast, are easier to use and I use them 90% of the time. I should have saved my money. Not a good choice, at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Its Milwaukee. These are some tough ass bits. Was cittung some holes in 2x6 blocking for 2" DWV and hit a few nails( more than 6 in one spot). Busted the clutch on a cheap gear drive angle drill. Got another drill and the bit kept on gettin it. Milwaukee is tough. Made for the working guy that needs to count on his tools.
customer_reviews.author: Benedict J. Heinzinger

customer_reviews.title: very good hole saws i ll buy it again and
customer_reviews.text: very good hole saws i ll buy it again and again

customer_reviews.title: beastly hole saw
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Tip-holes will not be perfect diameter , hole will be 1/16 to 1/8" larger after cut.. these things are beastly they work and they do their job well.
customer_reviews.author: contractor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for plumbing have bit that is tight for 3" ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for plumbing have bit that is tight for 3" 2" and 12/2 pvc pipe and one large enough for each so pipes don't rub. Bits are deep enough too drill throug plate and subfloor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Evans

customer_reviews.title: big hawg hole saws
customer_reviews.text: for drilling of larger diameter holes in wood these saws really shine, much easier to sue than the regular version
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Numinen

customer_reviews.title: 10-Piece Hawg Kit is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I use my 10-Piece Hawg Kit when I work on sailboats and to build projects in my home. The only thing I want that's not in the 10-Piece Hawg Kit is the extension rod to allow thiese tools to reach a little farther from my drill. Milwaukee makes these extensions, and I'll buy one when I order something else from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: David in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Bad product description
customer_reviews.text: This kit includes 10 pieces of hawgs, but does not specify the size of those. Wake up Milwaukee or Amazon. I found the specification from other website. It has 6 hawgs and 4 accessories. Diameters are 2-1/8" ,2-1/4" , 2-9/16", 3", 3-5/8", 4-1/4". Kit does not include bigger sizes like 4-3/4 or 6", check the size if it's the one you need.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan in Dublin

customer_reviews.title: For Professional use only
customer_reviews.text: These are fine hole saws, and it is great to have these large sizes . Because there are only three cutting surfaces, and they need a pretty powerful drill , they can catch while cutting and really tear the drill out of your hands and slap you around. This is not a handy homeowner friendly tool- professional use suggested.
customer_reviews.author: R. Beck

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the box i reseave was broken and all the pieces where damage

customer_reviews.title: These Big Hawg bits are awesome
customer_reviews.text: These Big Hawg bits are awesome. I am a professional plumber and these bits are a huge timesaver. I also own the Milwaukee cordless Super Hawg. Together they make very quick work of plumbing rough in.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M., San Diego, CA

customer_reviews.text: Love my set! Best part is hole saw makes rhe chunk you cut out just fall out of the hole saw instead of regular styles that require you to pry the pieces out.

product_meta.title: Milwaukee 49-56-9085 10-Piece Big Hawg Kit
product_meta.description:
Milwaukee 49-56-9085 10-Piece Big Hawg Kit

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Milwaukee Big Hawg's Aggressive Tooth Geometry drills 10-times faster than hole saws. The innovative three tooth design allows you to drill up to 600 holes without resharpening. The deep gullets and reduced pilot bit shank deliver easy plug removal saving you time and money. The Milwaukee Big Hawg's hardened steel teeth provide maximum durability against unintended nail impacts.
feature_bullets: The product is easy to use
The product is manufactured in China
Ten times faster than hole saws
Maximum durability against unintended nail impacts
